remarks: The supremum of a nonempty bounded set of reals is the least upper bound.  (Contributed by NM, 15-Nov-2004.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 6-Sep-2014.)
statement:
suprlub $p |- ( ( ( A C_ RR /\ A =/= (/) /\ E. x e. RR A. y e. A y <_ x ) /\ B e. RR ) -> ( B < sup ( A , RR , < ) <-> E. z e. A B < z ) ) $.
$d A x y $.
$d A z $.
$d B z $.
